text: BONN 1996-08-22 Germany 's Agriculture Ministry suggested on Wednesday that consumers avoid eating meat from British sheep until scientists determine whether mad cow disease can be transmitted to the animals .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_ORG O O
text: " Until this is cleared up by the European Union 's scientific panels -- and we have asked this to be done as quickly as possible -- ( consumers ) should if at all possible give preference to sheepmeat from other countries , " ministry official Werner Zwingmann told ZDF television .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: " I do not want to say that there is a concrete danger for consumers , " he added . " There are too many holes in what we know , and these must be filled very quickly . " Bonn has led efforts to ensure consumer protection tops the list of priorities in dealing with the mad cow crisis , which erupted in March when Britain acknowledged humans could contract a similar illness by eating contaminated beef .

text: SYDNEY 1996-08-22 Australian Davis Cup captain John Newcombe on Thursday signalled his possible resignation if his team loses an away tie against Croatia next month .

labels: O O B_MISC O O O O O O B_LOC O B_MISC I_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: The former Wimbledon champion said the immediate future of Australia 's Davis Cup coach Tony Roche could also be determined by events in Split .

labels: O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O B_LOC O B_ORG I_ORG O O
text: " If we lose this one , Tony and I will have to have a good look at giving someone else a go , " Newcombe was quoted as saying in Sydney 's Daily Telegraph newspaper .

labels: B_LOC O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Australia face Croatia in the world group qualifying tie on clay from September 20-22 .

labels: O B_PER O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O
text: Under Newcombe 's leadership , Australia were relegated from the elite world group last year , the first time the 26-time Davis Cup winners had slipped from the top rank .

labels: O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O B_PER O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Since taking over as captain from Neale Fraser in 1994 , Newcombe 's record in tandem with Roche , his former doubles partner , has been three wins and three losses .

labels: O O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O B_MISC O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O B_MISC O
text: Newcombe has selected Wimbledon semifinalist Jason Stoltenberg , Patrick Rafter , Mark Philippoussis , and Olympic doubles champions Todd Woodbridge and Mark Woodforde to face the Croatians .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: " We are ready to fight to our last breath -- Australia must play at its absolute best to win , " said Newcombe , who described the tie as the toughest he has faced as captain .

labels: B_LOC O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O B_PER O O O
text: Australia last won the Davis Cup in 1986 , but they were beaten finalists against Germany three years ago under Fraser 's guidance .

labels: B_LOC O B_ORG I_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O
text: BALTIMORE 1996-08-22 Baltimore Orioles manager Davey Johnson will miss Thursday night 's game against the Seattle Mariners after being admitted to a hospital with an irregular heartbeat .

labels: O O B_PER O O O O O O
text: The 53-year-old Johnson was hospitalized after experiencing dizziness .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O B_PER I_PER O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O
text: " He is in no danger and will be treated and observed this evening , " said Orioles team physician Dr. William Goldiner , adding that Johnson is expected to be released on Friday .

labels: O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O B_PER O O O
text: Orioles ' bench coach Andy Etchebarren will manage the club in Johnson 's absence .

labels: B_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O B_LOC I_LOC O B_LOC I_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Johnson is the second manager to be hospitalized this week after California Angels skipper John McNamara was admitted to New York 's Columbia Presbyterian Hospital on Wednesday with a blood clot in his left calf .

labels: B_PER O O O O O O B_LOC O O O B_ORG O O O O O B_PER I_PER O
text: Johnson , who played eight seasons in Baltimore , was named Orioles manager in the off-season replacing Phil Regan .

labels: O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O B_MISC I_MISC I_MISC I_MISC O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O
text: He led the Cincinnati Reds to the National League Championship Series last year and guided the New York Mets to a World Series championship in 1986 .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O
text: Rubin 's misfortune turned into a very lucky break for eighth-seeded Olympic champion Lindsay Davenport .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O
text: Davenport had drawn one of the toughest first-round assignments of any of the seeded players in 17th-ranked Karina Habsudova of Slovakia .

text: Rubin is the third notable withdrawal from the women 's competition after 12th-ranked former Australian Open champion Mary Pierce and 20th-ranked Wimbledon semifinalist Meredith McGrath pulled out earlier this week with injuries .

text: BALTIMORE 1996-08-22 Former Oriole Jamie Moyer allowed two hits over eight scoreless innings before tiring in the ninth and Paul Sorrento added his third grand slam of the season as the Seattle Mariners routed Baltimore 10-3 Thursday .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Moyer ( 10-2 ) , who was tagged for a pair of homers by Mike Devereaux and Brady Anderson and three runs in the ninth , walked none and struck out two .

labels: B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O
text: Norm Charlton retired the final three batters to seal the victory .

labels: O O O O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_PER I_PER O O
text: With one out in the fifth Ken Griffey Jr and Edgar Martinez stroked back-to-back singles off Orioles starter Rocky Coppinger ( 7-5 ) and Jay Buhner walked .

labels: B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Sorrento followed by hitting a 1-2 pitch just over the right-field wall for a 7-0 advantage .

labels: O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Right fielder Bobby Bonilla was after the ball , which was touched by fans at the top of the scoreboard in right .

text: We 've got to make up some ground . " In the American League wild-card race , the Mariners are three games behind the White Sox , two behind Baltimore and two ahead of the Red Sox heading into Boston for a weekend series .

text: BONN 1996-08-23 Hamburg side St Pauli , tipped as prime candidates for relegation , produced a stunning second-half fightback to draw 4-4 in their Bundesliga clash with Schalke on Friday .

text: Adrian Warner BRUSSELS 1996-08-23 Russia 's double Olympic champion Svetlana Masterkova smashed her second world record in just 10 days on Friday when she bettered the mark for the women 's 1,000 metres .

text: Adrian Warner BRUSSELS 1996-08-23 American Dennis Mitchell upstaged a trio of past and present Olympic 100 metres champions on Friday with a storming victory at the Brussels grand prix .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O B_MISC O O O O B_PER I_PER O
text: Sporting his customary bright green outfit , the U.S. champion clocked 10.03 seconds despite damp conditions to take the scalp of Canada 's reigning Olympic champion Donovan Bailey , 1992 champion Linford Christie of Britain and American 1984 and 1988 champion Carl Lewis .

labels: O B_MISC O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O B_LOC O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O
text: The Canadian was second in 10.09 with Lewis third in 10.10 , ahead of Atlanta bronze medallist Ato Boldon who clocked 10.12 in fourth .

labels: O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Lewis , making a rare appearance in Europe in a sprint race , left the track with a slight limp .

labels: O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O
text: American Olympic high hurdles champion Allen Johnson defied the wet conditions to produce a brilliant 12.92 seconds in the 110 metres race , just 0.01 outside the world record held by Britain 's Colin Jackson .

labels: B_PER O O O O O O B_LOC B_MISC O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O
text: Johnson ran the same time at the U.S. Olympic trials in Atlanta in June to become the second equal fastest hurdler of all time with American Roger Kingdom .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: He seemed to relish the new track at the Brussels meeting , dominating the race from start to finish with a slight wind at his back .

labels: O B_LOC O B_MISC O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: But Sweden 's Olympic high hurdles champion Ludmila Engquist , who crashed out of last week 's meeting in Zurich after hitting a hurdle , also kept her footing perfectly to win in a fast 12.60 seconds .

labels: O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O
text: Olympic silver medallist Brigita Bukovec of Slovenia could finish only fifth in the race in 12.95 .

labels: O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O
text: Jamaican Commonwealth champion Michelle Freeman took second in 12.77 ahead of Cuban Aliuska Lopez .

labels: O B_LOC O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O B_LOC O B_LOC O B_LOC O B_LOC O
text: The Zurich fall cost Engquist a shot at a jackpot of 20 one-kg gold bars which can be won by athletes who clinch their events at all of the Golden Four series in Oslo , Zurich , Brussels and Berlin .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Seven athletes went into Friday 's penultimate meeting of the series with a chance of winning the prize and American men 's 400 metres hurdles champion Derrick Adkins kept his hopes alive in the competition by winning his event in 47.93 .

text: LISBON 1996-08-23 Portugal 's new coach Artur Jorge called up six players from league champions Porto on Friday in an 18-man squad for the opening World Cup qualifier against Armenia on August 31 .

labels: O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O B_LOC O B_ORG O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O
text: Midfielder Paulo Sousa , recently transferred to Borussia Dortmund from Italy 's Juventus , is the only leading member of the Portuguese side from this year 's European championships who will not make the trip .

labels: O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_ORG O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O
text: It will be Jorge 's first game in charge of the national squad since taking over from Antonio Oliveira , who now coaches Porto , at the end of Euro 96 .

labels: O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O

text: BONN 1996-08-23 Trainer Berti Vogts kept faith with his entire European championship winning squad for Germany 's first match since their title victory , a friendly in Poland .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: Vogts picked no new players for the squad for the September 4 game in Zabrze .

labels: O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC I_MISC O O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O
text: Instead on Friday he nominated all 23 Euro ' 96 veterans including Bremen 's Jens Todt , called up before the final by special UEFA dispensation .

text: He will , however , have to do without the Dortmund trio of libero Matthias Sammer , midfielder Steffen Freund and defender Rene Schneider , who were all formally nominated despite being injured .

labels: B_LOC O B_LOC I_LOC O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O
text: COLOMBO 1996-08-23 Sri Lanka and Australia agreed on Friday that relations between the two teams had healed since the Sri Lankans ' acrimonious tour last year .

labels: O O I_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: The Sri Lankans were first found guilty then cleared of ball tampering and off-spinner Muttiah Muralitharan was called for throwing during a controversial three-test series in Australia .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O
text: " Our concern is to get out there and play proper cricket , " Sri Lanka captain Arjuna Ranatunga told a news conference on the eve of a warmup match between the World Cup champions and a World XI team scheduled for Saturday .

labels: O B_MISC O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: The Australians are making their first visit to the Indian Ocean island since boycotting a World Cup fixture in February after a terrorist bomb in Colombo .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Australia have been promised the presence of commandos , sniffer dogs and plainclothes policemen to ensure a limited overs tournament is trouble-free .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_LOC O
text: The tournament , starting on August 26 , also includes India and Zimbabwe .

labels: B_LOC O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Australia , led by wicketkeeper Ian Healy , opened their short tour of Sri Lanka with a five-run win over the country 's youth team on Thursday .

labels: O O O B_LOC O O O O
text: PRESS DIGEST - ANGOLA - AUG 23 .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O
text: LUANDA 1996-08-23 These are the leading stories in the Angolan press on Friday .

labels: B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy .

labels: O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O B_MISC O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: - - - - JORNAL DE ANGOLA - The Angolan Chief of State addressed a letter to UN Security Council proposing dates for the conclusion of the peace process in Angola .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG I_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O
text: He proposed definite dates , August 25 for return of Unita generals to the joint army , September 5 for the beginning of the formation of the Government of National Unity and Reconciliation .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O
text: Until this date the free circulation of peoples and goods should be guaranteed , the government administration installed in all areas and the Unita deputies should occupy their places in the National Assembly .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O
text: The president justified his proposal by the delays verified in the peace process , including the fact that areas under Unita control or occupation have not been effectively demilitarised , where the Unita military forces have been substituted by their so-called police .

text: Ori Lewis TAIBE , Israel 1996-08-23 For the first time in Israeli history , an Arab team will take the field when the National League soccer season starts on Saturday .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O B_MISC O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: The club , founded in 1961 , has a loyal following in Taibe , an Arab town of 28,000 in the heart of Israel .

labels: O O O B_ORG O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O B_LOC O
text: Two weeks ago Taibe , coached by Pole Wojtek Lazarek , met Betar , a club closely associated with the right-wing Likud party , for the first time in a Cup match in Jerusalem .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Chants from the crowd of " Death to the Arabs " , and bottle-throwing during the game marred the match which ended in a goalless draw .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER O O B_LOC O O O O B_LOC O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O B_MISC O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O
text: " We 're used to hearing the taunts of " Death to the Arabs ' , " said Sameh Haj Yihye , a Taibe resident who studies at Jerusalem 's Hebrew University . " But we know that these are only words , nobody has died from hearing them and it only makes us support our team more vehemently . " The dusty town of Taibe lacks the amenities of Jewish communities and many Israeli Arabs have long complained of state discrimination .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER O O

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O B_LOC O

" We will discuss this with the mayor and hopefully a new or refurbished ground will be completed by the start of the new year . " In the meantime , Taibe will play all their heavily policed home matches at the Jewish coastal town of Netanya .

text: LONDON 1996-08-24 Essex are set to step up their English county championship challenge with a fifth consecutive victory after new-ball pair Neil Williams and Mark Ilott sent Gloucestershire reeling on Saturday .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: Williams seized two wickets in two deliveries and left-armer Ilott also captured two as Gloucestershire , 252 behind on first innings , slumped to 27 for four at the close on the third day of the four-day game at Colchester .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Essex , who started the current round of matches in fifth place 20 points behind leaders Derbyshire with a game in hand , could go top if they complete victory on Monday 's last day and other results favour them .

labels: O O B_ORG O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O B_PER O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O
text: Williams thrust Essex on course for success by dispatching Matt Windows and Andrew Symonds in his second over , before Ilott removed Dominic Hewson and Tim Hancock to reduce Gloucestershire to 17 for four at one stage .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O
text: The visitors had started the day optimistically by sending back former England captain Graham Gooch when he added just six to his overnight 105 , but Essex went on to make 532 for eight before declaring .

labels: O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O B_ORG O O O O O O B_ORG O
text: Second-placed Kent were frustrated by rain which prevented any play at Cardiff , where they have reached 255 for three in their first innings against Glamorgan , while third-placed Surrey are facing an uphill task against Nottinghamshire .

labels: B_ORG O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O
text: Surrey slipped to 88 for four in reply to Notts ' commanding first innings of 446 for nine declared at Trent Bridge , before Alistair Brown struck a 55-ball half-century .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O
text: Brown 's 56 not out , containing eight fours and three sixes , lifted Surrey to 128 for four on a rain-curtailed day .

labels: O B_ORG O B_ORG O O O O B_LOC O O O O

text: LONDON 1996-08-24 Newcastle 's early season teething problems continued on Saturday when they lost 2-1 at home to premier league pacesetters Sheffield Wednesday .

labels: B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O
text: England striker Alan Shearer gave Kevin Keegan 's talent-laden side the lead from the penalty spot after 13 minutes after Wednesday 's Yugoslav Dejan Stefanovic pulled down Colombian forward Faustino Asprilla .

labels: O O O O B_ORG O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O
text: But two minutes later Wednesday equalised through Peter Atherton , who found space in the penalty area to meet Mark Pembridge 's free kick with a precise glancing header .

labels: B_PER I_PER O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O
text: Guy Whittingham stole three points for the Yorkshire side with a goal 10 minutes from time .

labels: O O O B_ORG O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O
text: To add to Newcastle 's misery , England striker Les Ferdinand was stretchered off in the second half .

text: PRETORIA , South Africa 1996-08-24 New Zealand made history on Saturday when they completed their first series victory in South Africa with a 33-26 victory in the second test .

labels: O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O B_PER I_PER I_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Two tries from wing Jeff Wilson in the first quarter gave New Zealand a 24-11 lead before tries from flanker Ruben Kruger and scrum-half Joost van der Westhuizen in the space of two minutes narrowed the gap to a single point at 23-24 .

labels: O B_ORG O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O

labels: B_LOC O B_MISC O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O
text: AMSTERDAM 1996-08-24 Dutch champions Ajax Amsterdam faltered in their second league match of the season on Saturday losing 2-0 away at Heerenveen .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Ajax , who had a dismal series of pre-season results before beating NAC of Breda in their opening game , had the best of an entertaining first half but failed to break the deadlock .

labels: O O O O O O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O B_LOC O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER I_PER O O B_ORG O O
text: Eight minutes after the interval , Heerenveen 's Romeo Wouden broke through the Amsterdam defence , left defender John Veldman standing and curled the ball beyond goalkeeper Edwin van der Sar into the Ajax net .

labels: O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Ajax , without injured defenders Marcio Santos and Winston Bogarde and strikers Jari Litmanen and Marc Overmars , then stepped up the pace and looked certain to equalise .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER O
text: But they left gaps at the back and on 73 minutes Danish striker Jon Dahl Tomasson rushed out of his own half , beat the Ajax defence and lobbed van der Sar .

labels: O O O B_ORG O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O
text: The defeat means Ajax 's main title contenders PSV Eindhoven , who beat the champions 3-0 in the traditional league curtain-raiser , can go three points clear of their rivals if they beat Groningen on Sunday .

text: We had very little food and sometimes went two or three days without eating . " Gunmen seized Penrose , who comes from Swerford in southern England , Frenchman Frederic Malardeau and six other hostages from their car in Grozny , the capital of Chechnya , on July 27 .

text: PEMBERTON , British Columbia 1996-08-24 About 350 adventurers from nine countries set out on Saturday to climb , raft , bike and run in a 323-mile ( 517-km ) endurance race through the Canadian wilderness .

text: The event , called the Eco-Challenge , is part of a growing sport known as adventure racing in which competitors test their limits for days over a perilous wilderness course .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O B_MISC O O
text: I think it will be more physically challenging and we 'll have to go up against more diverse situations due to the terrain , " said Dr. Michael Stroud , a veteran Eco-Challenge participant .

labels: O B_MISC O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Rwanda says Zaire expels 28 Rwandan refugees .

labels: B_LOC O B_LOC O O O O B_LOC O O O B_MISC B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: KIGALI 1996-08-24 Rwanda said on Saturday that Zaire had expelled 28 Rwandan Hutu refugees accused of being " trouble-makers " in camps in eastern Zaire .

labels: O O I_PER O O O O B_MISC B_MISC O O O B_ORG O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O B_LOC O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O B_MISC O O B_LOC O O O O
text: Captain Firmin Gatera , spokesman for the Tutsi-dominated Rwandan army , told Reuters in Kigali that 17 of the 28 refugees handed over on Friday from the Zairean town of Goma had been soldiers in the former Hutu army which fled to Zaire in 1994 after being defeated by Tutsi forces in Rwanda 's civil war .

labels: O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O
text: Zairean Prime Minister Kengo wa Dondo said on Thursday in a visit to Rwanda that his country would expell all the refugees back to Rwanda but he gave no timeframe .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O B_MISC B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Zaire is home to 1.1 million Rwandan Hutu refugees who fled three months of civil war in 1994 .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O B_LOC O
text: Many had taken part in the genocide that year of one million people , mostly Tutsis , and refuse to go home for fear of reprisal at the hands of the new Tutsi-dominated government in Kigali .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O B_LOC O O O O O O B_MISC O O O B_LOC O
text: Gatera said the refugees were handed over following a deal made at a meeting between the governor of Zaire 's north Kivu region and his counterpart in the Rwandan border town of Gisenyi .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O
text: " After a meeting between the governor of north Kivu and the prefect of Gisenyi , 28 prisoners ( refugees ) were handed over to Rwandan authorities on Friday , " Gatera said . " Out of these 17 were former soldiers .

labels: O O O O O B_LOC O O O B_PER O O
text: These people are now in Gisenyi prison , " Gatera added .

labels: B_LOC O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: JOHANNESBURG 1996-08-24 A limelight-loving South African chief was in disgrace on Saturday after a prized skull he brought home from Scotland was identified as belonging not to his sacred tribal ancestor , but to a middle-aged white woman .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_MISC O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O
text: A forensic scientist who examined the supposed skull of 19th century King Hintsa , a chief of President Nelson Mandela 's Xhosa tribe killed in battle by the British , said it was in fact the cranium of a European woman .

labels: O O I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O
text: Chief Nicholas Gcaleka , dressed in animal skins and full tribal regalia , journeyed to a wintry Scotland in February on a hugely publicised quest to find Hintsa 's skull .

labels: O B_PER O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O B_LOC O
text: But Gcaleka ran into trouble as soon as he returned to South Africa with a skull he found in a cottage in a lonely Highland forest near Inverness .

labels: O O O B_MISC O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Members of the Xhosa royal family , branding Gcaleka a charlatan , confiscated the head and sent it for tests to a forensic scientist , who examined the shape of the skull and the hole that he determined had not come , as supposed , from a bullet .

text: AKRON , Ohio 1996-08-25 Phil Mickelson birdied two of the last three holes to win World Series of Golf by three strokes over Billy Mayfair on Sunday .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O
text: It was the fourth tournament title this year for Mickelson , who shot an even-par 70 , after being tied for the lead with Billy Mayfair with three holes to play .

labels: O O B_PER O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O
text: Along with Mayfiar at 277 for the tournament were Steve Stricker , who had a 68 , and Duffy Waldorf , with a 66 .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O
text: " It was very hard to sleep last night because there was so much I could accomplish with this win , " said Mickelson , who had a three-stroke lead entering the third round . " This was a win I wanted very , very much . " Mickelson 's victory gave him a 10 year exemption to the PGA Tour .

labels: O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O
text: He lost to Greg Norman in sudden death last year .

text: SUGO , Japan 1996-08-25 Teenager Yuuichi Takeda , racing in only his first season , outclassed the big names to win the first race in round nine of the world superbike championship on Sunday .

labels: B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Takeda , 18 , showed poise far beyond his years to overtake Australian Ducati rider Troy Corser , last year 's championship runner-up , with four of the 25 laps left .

labels: B_ORG O B_PER O O O B_PER O O B_ORG O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Honda 's Takeda was pursued past Corser by the Yamaha duo of Noriyuki Haga and Wataru Yoshikawa with Haga briefly taking the lead in the final chicane on the last lap .

labels: O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O B_PER O O
text: But Takeda found one more spurt of power to just take the flag first with Haga second and Yoshikawa third .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O
text: Corser , who crashed during practice on Friday , limped in fourth , four seconds behind Takeda with championship leader Aaron Slight of New Zealand 11 seconds behind the winner .

labels: O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O
text: In the second race , Takeda again challenged strongly until the fifth lap from the end when he crashed while running second to eventual race winner Takuma Aoki .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O B_LOC I_LOC O O B_ORG O O O O O O
text: Aoki , the elder brother of reigning 125cc world champion Haruchika , had a race-long duel with John Kocinski of the United States on a Ducati before taking the chequered flag .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O
text: Kocinski led for the early laps before he was passed first by Aoki , who recorded the fastest lap of 147.786 kph , and then by Takeda .

labels: O B_PER O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O B_PER O
text: With Takeda out of the race , Kocinski regained second place but he could not overtake Aoki .

labels: B_MISC I_MISC O B_MISC I_MISC I_MISC O O O O

text: LONDON 1996-08-25 South African fast bowler Shaun Pollock concluded his Warwickshire career with a flourish on Sunday by taking the final three wickets during the county 's Sunday league victory over Worcestershire .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O
text: Pollock , who returns home on Tuesday for an ankle operation , took the last three wickets in nine balls as Worcestershire were dismissed for 154 .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: After an hour 's interruption for rain , Warwickshire then reached an adjusted target of 109 with 13 balls to spare and record their fifth win in the last six games .

labels: B_ORG O O O O O O B_ORG O B_ORG O B_ORG O
text: Warwickshire are currently in fourth position behind Yorkshire , Nottinghamshire and Surrey .

labels: B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O
text: Yorkshire captain David Byas completed his third Sunday league century as his side swept clear at the top of the table , reaching a career best 111 not out against Lancashire .

labels: B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Lancashire 's total of 205 for eight from 40 overs looked reasonable before Byas put their attack to the sword , collecting his runs from just 100 balls with three sixes and nine fours .

labels: B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Yorkshire eventually reached their target with only four wickets down and 7.5 overs to spare .

text: CRICKET - RUN-OUT GIVES LEWIS AND ENGLAND SLIM SATISFACTION .

labels: B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O
text: LONDON 1996-08-25 Chris Lewis did his best to forget his controversial omission from the England one-day squad on Sunday but could not prevent Pakistan reasserting their dominance in the final test at The Oval .

labels: O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: A super piece of fielding by Lewis , dropped as a disciplinary measure after arriving only 35 minutes before the start on the fourth morning , provided the only bright spot for England as the touring team batted on to reach 413 for five at the interval , a lead of 87 .

labels: O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O
text: The solitary wicket to fall was Asif Mujtaba , run out for 13 attempting a second run to third man where Lewis was lurking with a point to prove .

labels: O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O
text: There seemed scant danger until the Surrey player swooped on to the ball and returned off balance to county team mate Alec Stewart who whipped off the bails .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Lewis , though , could not make similar waves with the ball as Salim Malik and Wasim Akram batted through the rest of the session with few alarms .

text: BALTIMORE 1996-08-25 Rafael Palmeiro 's two-out single in the sixth inning scored Roberto Alomar with the go-ahead run as the Baltimore Orioles rallied past the California Angels 5-4 and took over the American League 's wild-card berth on Saturday .

labels: O B_ORG O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O
text: The Orioles trailed 4-3 when pinch-hitter Mike Devereaux led off the sixth with a triple against reliever Kyle Abbott ( 0-1 ) and scored the tying run on Alomar 's single .

labels: O B_PER I_PER O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O
text: After Brady Anderson sacrificed , Palmeiro hit the first pitch into right field for a single , scoring Alomar .

labels: O B_LOC O O B_PER I_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: In Boston , former Mariner Darren Bragg 's first career grand slam in the sixth inning off reliever Randy Johnson lifted the Boston Red Sox to their fifth win in six games , a 9-5 victory over Seattle .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O
text: I got the good part of the bat on it and it carried out . " In Cleveland , Kevin Seitzer 's two-out single in the top of the 10th brought home David Hulse with the winning run as the Milwaukee Brewers sent the Cleveland Indians to their third straight extra-inning defeat 4-3 .

labels: B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Bob Wickman ( 5-1 ) , acquired from the New York Yankees on Friday , earned the win in his Milwaukee debut despite allowing the tying run in the eighth inning .

labels: O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O
text: At Minnesota , Marty Cordova and Matt Lawton hit solo homers and Frankie Rodriguez allowed six hits over seven innings to earn his first win as a starter in a month as the Minnesota Twins held on to beat the Texas Rangers 6-5 .

text: " Yeah , you know it 's fun , it 's always fun when you 've got a chance to go to the ballpark and win a game that 's important , " said Rodriguez . text: Anton Ferreira CAPE TOWN 1996-08-25 South Africa 's truth commission begins issuing subpoenas this week in a bid to dig beneath the political rationales and find the sinister figures who have the blood of the country 's race war on their hands .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Leaders of the major parties involved , from right-wing whites to radical blacks , appeared before Archbishop Desmond Tutu 's Truth and Reconciliation Commission last week to paint the broad picture of their actions for or against apartheid .

labels: O O O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Most , including former president F.W. de Klerk and African National Congress Deputy President Thabo Mbeki , offered apologies for any mistakes they had made and accepted broad responsibility for the actions of their foot soldiers .

text: Samir Arnaut MATUZICI , Bosnia 1996-08-25 Thousands of Moslem refugees denounced Bosnia 's elections as a farce on Sunday because Serb incomers would be able to vote in their old home town , cementing partition of the country .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_LOC O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: They said they were ready to force their way back across post-war ethnic lines to Serb-held Doboj , one of several towns where NATO troops fear violence involving refugees determined to vote where they once lived .

labels: O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O B_LOC O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O
text: The refugees , rallying in Matuzici on government territory two km from Doboj in northeast Bosnia , waved banners calling the polls a farce staged by the United Nations and the European Union . " We demand to vote in Doboj , " other banners said .

labels: O O B_MISC O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O
text: Bosnia 's Moslem-led central government and many displaced Moslems are angered by a key provision of the Western-organised September 14 elections allowing people to vote in post-war " new places of residence . " As a result , separatist Serb authorities have packed former Moslem majority towns with refugees of their own or registered other Serbs to vote there .

labels: O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER I_PER O B_LOC O B_MISC O O O O O O
text: " Only our physical presence in Doboj will mean that the Dayton peace treaty has truly been implemented , " Edhem Efendija Camdzic , Doboj 's Islamic imam-in-exile , told the refugees .

text: " The main point of this rally is to highlight to the world powers what misfortune they brought upon us , " said Reuf Mehemdagic , head of Doboj municipality-in-exile .

labels: O O O B_MISC O O O O O B_LOC O O O O
text: " Eleven thousand Serbs who came from elsewhere to Doboj will vote there .

" Bosnian Vice President Ejup Ganic , a Moslem , told the refugees : " We have a message for the Serbs who are now in our homes not to plan the future of their children there because there will be no good fortune in that . " To loud applause , he added : " We will enter Doboj , untie the Doboj knot and ensure free movement for all .

text: RUGBY LEAGUE - ST HELENS CLINCH SUPER LEAGUE TITLE .

labels: O O O B_LOC O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O
text: ST HELENS , England 1996-08-26 St Helens completed their first league and Challenge Cup double in 30 years on Monday when they thrashed Warrington 66-14 to clinch the inaugural Super League title .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: St Helens secured the two points they needed in the last game of the season at Knowsley Road to win their first championship since 1975 and their first double since 1966 .

labels: O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O
text: In rain-soaked conditions , centre Alan Hunte grabbed a hat-trick of tries , while Tommy Martyn , Anthony Sullivan and Paul Newlove each scored two .

labels: O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O
text: Captain and goalkicker Bobbie Goulding scored 18 points .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O B_MISC O O
text: St Helens 's triumph marked the end of Wigan 's seven-year reign as British champions .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O
text: St Helens needed to win on Monday to take the title -- a defeat or draw would have allowed Wigan their eighth consecutive championship .

labels: O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O
text: They were also the toast of London Broncos , who managed to scrape into the top four ahead of Warrington and qualify for the end-of-season play-offs .

labels: B_ORG O O O
text: Bradford finished third .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O
text: St Helens have now set their sights on taking the treble by winning the end-of-season premiership which begins with next Sunday 's semifinal against London .

labels: O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC I_MISC O O O
text: JYVASKYLA , Finland 1996-08-26 Tommi Makinen took a significant step towards becoming world rally champion with a brilliant victory in the 1000 Lakes Rally on Monday .

labels: B_ORG O B_PER O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Mitsubishi driver Makinen stopped experienced fellow Finn Juha Kankkunen in his tracks on the final day of the 1,452-km rally , doubling his lead on the first two decisive stages .

labels: O O O O O B_ORG O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O
text: Kankkunen was runner-up in his Toyota as Finland 's Jarmo Kytolehto produced a remarkable drive to finish third in his Ford .

labels: O B_PER I_PER O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Swede Kenneth Eriksson kept Subaru in the hunt for the manufacturers ' title with fifth place in spite of a gearbox problem that nearly forced him off the road close to the end of the event .

labels: O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O B_ORG O O O
text: Maakinen 's and Mitsubishi 's positions were strengthened by the late retirement of Spain 's Carlos Sainz when his Ford gearbox failed .

labels: O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O B_ORG O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O
text: JYVASKYLA , Finland 1996-08-26 Tommi Makinen of Finland , driving a Mitsubishi , on Monday won the 1,000 Lakes Rally , sixth round of the world championship .

text: SOCCER - SHARPE HITS WINNER TO EASE PRESSURE ON LEEDS .

labels: B_LOC O B_LOC O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O B_LOC O O O
text: LEEDS , England 1996-08-26 Winger Lee Sharpe hit a superb strike from the edge of the penalty area to give Leeds their first win of the season on Monday and leave hapless Wimbledon anchored at the bottom of the England premier league .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O
text: Sharpe repaid a huge slice of the 4.5 million pound ( $ 6.98 million ) fee Leeds handed Manchester United for his services with a top-draw second-half goal to hand Wimbledon their third successive defeat .

labels: B_PER I_PER O O B_MISC O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Ian Rush , the Welsh striker signed from Liverpool in the close season , set up the goal , feeding Sharpe as he galloped forward and the former England winger cut inside onto his unfavoured right foot to arc a shot into the right-hand corner of the net .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O
text: The only goal of the match also brought some relief for under-fire Leeds manager Howard Wilkinson following the team 's poor start to the season .

text: Mark Gleeson JOHANNESBURG 1996-08-26 The tiny islands of the Seychelles failed to make soccer history at the weekend when they bowed out of the preliminary rounds of the African Nations Cup .

labels: O O B_LOC I_LOC O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Trailing fellow Indian Ocean islanders Mauritius 1-0 from the first leg , they were held to a 1-1 draw at home on Saturday despite playing against 10 men for most of the match .

labels: O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O
text: The 2-1 aggregate took Mauritius into the group phase of the qualifiers for the 1998 finals , and kept up the Seychelles ' record of never having won an official match in their 10 years of FIFA membership .

labels: O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: The Seychelles must have thought they were on course for a historic breakthrough when Mauritian midfielder Andre Caboche was sent off for a crude tackle in the 19th minute .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_LOC O O B_LOC O
text: Mauritius now play in group seven of the qualifiers against Malawi , Mozambique and favourites Zambia .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O
text: Namibia , who drew 0-0 with Botswana in their first leg , won the second leg in Windhoek 6-0 to stretch their unbeaten run to eight matches and continue their remarkable progress on the African soccer stage .

labels: O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_LOC O B_LOC O
text: They now play in group five with Cameroon , Gabon and Kenya .

labels: O O B_PER I_PER O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: German-based striker Bachirou Salou returned home to Togo to score the decisive only goal of their tie against Congo .

labels: B_PER O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_LOC O B_LOC O
text: Salou , who plays for MSV Duisburg in the Bundesliga , scored in the 53rd minute of Sunday 's match in Lome for a 1-0 aggregate win which takes his side into group six , where they will meet Liberia , Tanzania and Zaire .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O B_LOC O O O O O O
text: Ethiopia needed a penalty shoot-out in Addis Ababa to overcome Uganda after a 2-2 aggregate scoreline .

labels: O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O
text: Both legs ended 1-1 before Ethiopia won the spot kick decider 4-2 .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O
text: Uganda 's elimination follows their humiliating 5-1 aggregate defeat by Angola in June 's World Cup qualifying preliminaries .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_LOC O B_LOC O O O O O O
text: The other preliminary round second leg match , between Mauritania and Benin in Nouakchott , was postponed until Friday .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O O
text: Benin won the first leg 4-1 .

labels: B_LOC O B_MISC O B_MISC O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O
text: MOSCOW 1996-08-26 Russian double Olympic swimming champion Alexander Popov was in a serious condition on Monday after being stabbed on a Moscow street .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC I_LOC O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O
text: " His condition is serious , " said Rimma Maslova , deputy chief doctor of Hospital No 31 in the Russian capital . " But he is conscious and is talking and smiling . " Maslova told Reuters she was not an expert in sports medicine , but said it was too early to judge Popov 's chances of returning to competitive swimming .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: Popov , who won gold in the 50 and 100 metres freestyle at the recent Atlanta Olympics , was stabbed in the abdomen late on Saturday after an argument with a group of roadside watermelon sellers in south-west Moscow .

labels: B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Interfax news agency said police had detained one of the attackers .

labels: O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC I_MISC I_MISC O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_LOC O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O
text: Vitaly Smirnov , president of the Russian National Olympic Committee , said President Boris Yeltsin had given the swimmer Russia 's top award for his Olympic performance . " I am not a doctor but I think he is doing all right , " said Smirnov .

labels: O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_LOC O
text: Smirnov said the Olympic Committee might ask the government to take measures to protect the country 's best athletes , some of whom have already chosen to live abroad for fear of a surge in crime in post-Soviet Russia .

text: Larry Fine NEW YORK 1996-08-26 Martina Hingis led a youthful charge and Australian Open finalist Anke Huber and Magdalena Maleeva were fallen seeds on Monday in a hot , sunny opening to the U.S. Open tennis championships .

labels: O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O
text: The 15-year-old Hingis , seeded 16th , was honoured to play the first match of the season 's last Grand Slam on Stadium Court but happy to hurry off with a straight-sets victory over the 112th-ranked Angeles Montolio of Spain .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O B_PER O B_LOC O O O B_PER O B_LOC O
text: Hoping for a longer engagement on the cement at Flushing Meadows were the sixth-seeded Huber of Germany and 12th seed Maleeva of Bulgaria .

labels: O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC I_LOC O
text: Huber , who lost to Monica Seles in the Australian Open final , fell victim to an unfortunate draw in bowing to dangerous floater Amanda Coetzer of South Africa .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O
text: Coetzer , ranked 17th , avenged her defeat to Huber in the Australian Open semifinals by winning 6-1 2-6 6-2 .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O
text: It was maybe my best first round match in a Grand Slam I ever played . " Monday brought the best out in U.S. Open rookie Aleksandra Olsza of Poland , ranked 110th .

labels: O B_MISC O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O
text: The Swiss teenager , a twice French Open junior champion and a Wimbledon juniors winner , had already proven her main stage mettle by reaching the quarters at this year 's Australian Open .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O
text: " There will be tough matches but I hope I can get there , " she said . " Then we 'll see if Arantxa will be there , too . " The fast-moving Olsza , 18 , was cool in her opening match .

labels: B_PER I_PER O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O B_PER I_PER O O O
text: Brenda Schultz-McCarthy of the Netherlands , the 13th seed , was a 6-1 6-4 winner over Japan 's Nana Miyaga , while Czech veteran Helena Sukova prevailed over Yone Kamio 6-2 6-3 .

labels: O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O
text: Austrian Barbara Paulus , seeded 14th , also reached the second round with a 6-2 6-1 victory over Yi Jing-Qian of China .

labels: O O B_LOC I_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O
text: Richard Finn NEW YORK 1996-08-26 Michael Stich nearly pulled out of the U.S. Open in protest over the men 's seeding fiasco but the former Wimbledon champion was glad he stayed after sweating out a four-set win on Monday over qualifier Tommy Haas .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O B_MISC I_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: One prominent player that did not stay for the Open was French Open champion Yvegeny Kafelnikov , who after being dropped three spots from his ATP ranking to a seventh seeding , withdrew and returned home to Russia .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC B_MISC I_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O
text: At a news conference attended by approximately 50 players on Sunday , U.S. Davis Cup player Todd Martin expressed the players ' outrage at the seedings .

labels: O O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O O B_MISC O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O B_PER O O O O
text: Others advancing early on Monday included 11th-seeded American Malivai Washington , the Wimbledon runner-up , Sweden 's Magnus Gustafsson , and two-time former French Open champion Sergi Bruguera of Spain , who will be Stich 's next opponent .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O B_MISC O O B_PER I_PER O
text: " I get the feeling that everything is done here for the American players and they forget about all the other players , " said Stich , who lost the 1994 Open final to Andre Agassi .

labels: O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: It was Agassi who was at the centre of the controversy that engulfed the tournament since the original draw was completed on Wednesday .

labels: O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O B_MISC O
text: " He ( Agassi ) should be seeded the way he is playing tennis right now , " said Stich about the unfairness of moving up Agassi , who made early exits from the French Open and Wimbledon .

labels: O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O
text: Ranked 18th in the world , Stich might have been slipped into that spot ahead of Spain 's Felix Mantilla , who is 16th but had never been played in the Open and had been left out of the seedings originally .

text: ATLANTA 1996-08-25 Brian McRae singled in Tyler Houston in the top of the ninth inning to snap a tie as the Chicago Cubs avoided a three-game sweep with 3-2 victory over the Atlanta Braves on Sunday .

text: " The biggest thing was my fastball , I was able to rotate it pretty good , " Foster said . " Also , I was able to keep my changeup down . " At Colorado , Vinny Castilla homered twice and drove in four runs and Larry Walker went 3-for-4 with a homer and three RBI as the Colorado Rockies outslugged the Pittsburgh Pirates 13-9 in the rubber game of a three-game series .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_ORG O O O O O
text: Castilla 's first homer of the game , a solo shot in the seventh off reliever Marc Wilkins ( 3-1 ) extended Colorado 's lead to 9-7 .

labels: O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O B_ORG I_ORG O O
text: At Florida , Edgar Renteria 's two-out single in the bottom of the ninth inning scored Jesus Tavarez with the winning run as the Florida Marlins edged the Cincinnati Reds 6-5 .

text: " Right after Edgar made contact , I knew I had to score , " said Tavarez . " I knew I would score even if he fielded it cleanly , he could n't throw me out . " " Edgar is a tremendous player right now , " said Florida manager John Boles . " But I ca n't wait to see how good he 'll be when he grows up . " In San Francisco , Osvaldo Fenandez fired a seven-hitter and Trenidad Hubbard belted a two-run homer as the San Francisco Giants ended a three-game losing streak by defeating the Montreal Expos , 7-2 .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O
text: Fernandez ( 6-13 ) allowed two runs , walked one and struck out eight for his second career complete game , both against Montreal .

text: In Los Angeles , Greg Gagne had a run-scoring single and Chad Curtis drew a bases-loaded walk in the bottom of the eighth inning as the Los Angeles Dodgers rallied for a 6-5 victory and a three-game sweep of the New York Mets .

" Mike Piazza In San Diego , Steve Finley and Jody Reed drove in three runs apiece as the San Diego Padres built a six-run lead after three innings and cruised to an 11-2 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies .

text: Kurt Schork SARAJEVO 1996-08-26 Bosnia 's election organisers will decide on Tuesday whether or not to postpone municipal elections scheduled as part of nationwide balloting , an OSCE spokeswoman said on Monday .

labels: O O O O O O O I_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O
text: Officials from the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe ( OSCE ) are considering the postponement following allegations of serious irregularities in the registration of Serb refugees .

labels: O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O B_LOC O
text: " Tomorrow ... the Provisional Election Commission will consider the possible postponement of municipal elections only ... the other elections will be held on September 14 , " OSCE spokeswoman Agota Kuperman told reporters in Sarajevo .

labels: O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O B_MISC O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O
text: Balloting inside Bosnia is scheduled for September 14 , when citizens are slated to elect municipal and cantonal assemblies , separate Moslem-Croat and Serb parliaments , a national House of Representatives and a three-man Presidency .

labels: O B_LOC O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O B_LOC O B_MISC O B_ORG O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: A Sarajevo daily newspaper , Dnevi Avaz , which is close to Bosnia 's Moslem nationalist SDA party , on Monday said the OSCE would postpone the municipal-level elections until the Spring of 1997 because of the refugee registration problems .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O B_ORG O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O
text: " I do n't know what the source of the Dnevi Avaz report is , but it is consistent with what I have heard from western diplomats and from inside the OSCE , " said an OSCE staff member in Sarajevo who asked not to be named .

labels: O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: OSCE and independent monitors allege that Serb authorities have systematically discouraged refugees from registering to cast a ballot in the places they lived before the war .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Diplomats explain the purpose of this electoral engineering is to secure Serb control over pivotal towns inside the 49 per cent of Bosnia known as the Serb republic , consolidating through the ballot box what was initially taken in war .

labels: O O B_ORG O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O

text: Alastair Macdonald MOSCOW 1996-08-26 Alexander Lebed may finally get to discuss his Chechen peace proposals with Boris Yeltsin on Tuesday after a lost weekend in the region when he was forced to abandon plans to sign a new political treaty with the separatist rebels .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O B_LOC O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O
text: Despite a mood of compromise in the region after some of the worst fighting of the war , Lebed may be just finding out that concluding a long-term settlement , somewhere between rebel demands for independence and Moscow 's insistence that Chechnya remain part of Russia , will be no easy matter .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O B_LOC O
text: A chain-smoking former paratroop general with a sharp line in deadpan putdowns and a soldier 's knack for making life sound simple , Lebed managed to arrange an ambitious ceasefire in the region last week , days after the Russian army threatened to bomb its way back into the rebel-held Chechen capital Grozny .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Saying he needed to tidy up legal loose ends on the deal -- and also cover his back against unnamed pro-war schemers in Moscow -- he flew back to the capital empty-handed on Sunday .

labels: O O B_MISC O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O B_ORG I_ORG O O O B_PER O O O
text: He met Russian Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin on Monday and , according to the press service of Lebed 's Security Council , could meet Yeltsin on Tuesday .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Moscow 's as yet undisclosed proposals on Chechnya 's political future have , meanwhile , been sent back to do the rounds of various government departments .

labels: O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Speculation mounted last week that Lebed was operating out on a limb in Chechnya as Yeltsin , hardly seen since his reelection last month , kept out of sight and then gave an interview criticising his envoy just as he clinched a truce .

labels: O B_PER O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_PER O
text: But Chernomyrdin took pains at the weekend to insist Lebed was playing for a united team and that the proposals he took to rebel chief-of-staff Aslan Maskhadov had been agreed by Yeltsin .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O
text: If that were the case , it was unclear why Lebed suddenly found it necessary to have the deal verified in Moscow .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Lebed himself said he was concerned that powerful interests in Moscow , who have profited from the war and want it to go on , would seize on any inadequacy in the deal to remove him .

labels: O O O B_PER O O O O O O O B_MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O O B_MISC O O
text: Maskhadov warned that Lebed risked the same fate as a former Russian army commander in the region who sought a compromise and was blown up last year by -- so the Chechens say -- Russian forces .

labels: O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O
text: Chernomyrdin said voters should decide Chechnya 's future but stressed there was no question of the government letting the region quit the Russian Federation -- something Moscow fears could encourage separatist tendencies in other ethnic regions , particularly in the strategic North Caucasus .

labels: O O O O O O B_ORG O
text: Yeltsin on holiday from Monday - Interfax .

labels: B_LOC O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O
text: MOSCOW 1996-08-26 Russian President Boris Yeltsin began a new summer holiday on Monday but would remain in control of affairs of state , Interfax news agency said .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O B_LOC O
text: " The head of state 's holiday has only just begun , " the agency quoted Sergei Yastrzhembsky as saying , adding that the president was currently in a Kremlin residence near Moscow .

labels: B_ORG O B_PER O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O
text: Interfax said Yastrezhembsky did not exclude that Yeltsin could spend some time in other places .

labels: O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O B_PER O O O
text: " One must give B. Yeltsin a chance to rest and recover his health after the elections , " Interfax quoted Yastrezhembsky as saying .

labels: O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: " ( Yeltsin ) controls internal and international policies , daily receives a big packet of documents from Moscow , which demand his intervention ... Many of those documents return to the president 's administration the same day , " he said .

labels: B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O
text: LONDON 1996-08-27 Graham Gooch , the 43-year-old former England captain , is to continue playing county cricket for at least another season , his club Essex announced on Tuesday .

labels: O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O
text: Opener Gooch 's decision comes towards the end of a season in which he has underlined his consistency by becoming the leading scorer in Essex 's history , beating Keith Fletcher 's aggregate of 29,434 .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Gooch , who retired from test cricket after the 1994-95 tour of Australia but is now an England selector , is seventh in this season 's first-class averages with 1,429 runs at 64.95 , having hit five centuries and one double century .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O
text: You just have to look at his record to appreciate that fact . " SOCCER - ROMANIA CLUB BOSS BANNED FOR HEADBUTT .

labels: B_LOC O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: BUCHAREST 1996-08-27 The Romanian Soccer Federation has banned first division club Jiul Petrosani 's president Miron Cozma for two years for headbutting a visiting team player , a federation statement said .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O
text: Romania 's soccer bosses also fined Cozma , a well-known miners ' union leader , 10 million lei ( $ 3000 ) for the half-time attack on Dinamo Bucharest 's Danut Lupu last Sunday .

labels: O O O B_PER O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O
text: Miners led by Cozma rioted in Bucharest in 1990 and 1991 , bringing down the reformist government of premier Petre Roman .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O B_LOC O
text: Cozma is awaiting trial for assault and criminal damage in a bar in his home town of Petrosan , 300 kms west of Bucharest .

labels: O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O B_ORG O O O
text: " Cozma 's blow was not too painful because I 'm a tall man , " Lupu told Reuters on Tuesday .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_LOC O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Lupu is one of the tallest players in Romania 's first division , towering over Cozma by some 17 cms , Jiul Petrosani , promoted to the first division this year , won the league game 1-0 .

text: Larry Fine NEW YORK 1996-08-27 Stefan Edberg produced some of his vintage best on Tuesday to extend his grand run at the Grand Slams by toppling Wimbledon champion Richard Krajicek in straight sets at the U.S. Open .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O
text: " There 's not doubt about it , Richard was definitely off his game and I took advantage , " said Edberg .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O O O O
text: " I still have my days where I feel great out there . " Also reaching the second round were top-seeded defending champion Pete Sampras , a 6-2 6-2 6-1 winner over last minute replacement Jimy Szymanski of Venezuela , called on after Adrian Voinea of Romania withdrew because of a sprained ankle .

labels: O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O
text: Third seed Thomas Muster of Austria also charged into the second round with a 6-1 7-6 ( 7-2 ) 6-2 romp over Javier Frana of Argentina .

labels: O O O B_LOC O O O O O O O O
text: Marcelo Rios of Chile , the 10th seed , also advanced .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O
text: Rios claimed a 4-6 6-1 6-4 6-2 victory over Romania 's Andrei Pavel .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER I_PER O O O O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O
text: On the women 's side , second seed Monica Seles got off to a strong start by beating fellow-American Anne Miller 6-0 6-1 and was joined in the second round by Spain 's Arantxa Sanchez Vicario ( seeded third ) , Olympic champion Lindsay Davenport ( 8 ) and Karina Habsudova of Slovakia ( 17 ) .

labels: O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O
text: The women 's draw lost another seed when Austrian Judith Wiesner overcame Iva Majoli of Croatia 2-6 6-3 6-1 .

labels: O O O B_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O
text: The fifth- seeded Majoli joined Anke Huber ( 5 ) and Magdalena Maleeva ( 12 ) on the sidelines .

text: SAN FRANCISCO 1996-08-27 William VanLandingham pitched eight scoreless innings and Glenallen Hill drove in the game 's only run with a first-inning single as the San Francisco Giants claimed a 1-0 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies on Monday .

labels: B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O
text: VanLandingham ( 8-13 ) , who entered the game with one complete game in the first 56 starts of his career , limited the Phillies to two hits and two walks with four strikeouts .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O
text: " We 've been working all year on my follow-through , and I really concentrated on that , " VanLandingham said . " It gave me more life in all of my pitches , so the ball moved more . " At Colorado , Andres Galarraga homered and drove in three runs as the Colorado Rockies had 10 extra-base hits and Billy Swift won his first game in almost a year in a 9-5 rain-shortened seven-inning victory over the Cincinnati Reds .

labels: O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O
text: In Houston , Andy Benes allowed two runs over seven innings and Royce Clayton had a run-scoring single in the seventh to lift the St. Louis Cardinals to a 3-2 victory over the Houston Astros .

labels: O B_ORG O O O O O O B_ORG O O B_MISC I_MISC I_MISC I_MISC O
text: The Cardinals moved within one-half game of first-place Houston in the National League Central Division .

text: BALTIMORE 1996-08-27 Cal Ripken 's bases-loaded walk scored Brady Anderson with the winning run in the bottom of the 10th as the Baltimore Orioles regained control of the top spot in the wild-card race with a wild 12-11 victory over the Oakland Athletics .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O
text: Trailing by a run entering the 11th , the Orioles rallied against Oakland reliever Mark Acre ( 0-2 ) with a walk and a triple by Brady Anderson to tie the game .

labels: O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O B_PER O
text: Then Oakland manager Art Howe decided to intentionally walk Rafael Palmeiro and Bobby Bonilla to load the bases but Acre was nowhere near the plate to Ripken .

labels: O O O O O B_PER O O O B_ORG O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O
text: The decisive pitch nearly hit Ripken and gave the Orioles a one-half game lead over the Chicago White Sox in the wild-card race .

labels: O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O
text: In Seattle , Jay Buhner 's eighth-inning single snapped a tie as the Seattle Mariners edged the New York Yankees 2-1 in the opener of a three-game series .

labels: O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O B_ORG O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O
text: New York starter Jimmy Key left the game in the first inning after Seattle shortstop Alex Rodriguez lined a shot off his left elbow .

labels: O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_MISC O B_ORG O O O O O
text: The Yankees have lost 12 of their last 19 games and their lead in the AL East over Baltimore fell to five games .

labels: O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O
text: At California , Tim Wakefield pitched a six-hitter for his third complete game of the season and Mo Vaughn and Troy O'Leary hit solo home runs in the second inning as the surging Boston Red Sox won their third straight 4-1 over the California Angels .

labels: B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Boston has won seven of eight and is 20-6 since August 2nd .

labels: O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O
text: In Chicago , Cal Eldred pitched 5-1/3 scoreless innings and John Jaha scored one run and doubled in another as the Milwaukee Brewers held off the slumping Chicago White Sox , 3-2 .

labels: O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Angel Miranda retired one batter and Bob Wickman retired the next four but loaded the bases in the eighth .

labels: O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O
text: In Detroit , Jim Thome 's solo homer in the ninth inning snapped a tie and Charles Nagy pitched a three-hitter for his first win in over a month , leading the Cleveland Indians to their 11th straight victory over the Detroit Tigers , 2-1 .

labels: O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_PER I_PER O O O O O B_ORG I_ORG I_ORG O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O
text: In Toronto , Juan Guzman allowed three runs over seven innings to make homers by Joe Carter and Carlos Delgado stand up as the surging Toronto Blue Jays held off the Minnesota Twins , 5-3 .

labels: B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Toronto returned home from a 10-game road trip and won for the eighth time in nine games as Guzman ( 11-8 ) allowed nine hits and struck out eight without a walk .

text: Larry Fine NEW YORK 1996-08-26 Michael Chang is playing in his 10th U.S. Open and enjoying his highest seeding ever , but the 24-year-old American had to overcome a case of the jitters Monday before winning his first-round match on opening day .

labels: O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O
text: Chang , seeded second behind defending champion Pete Sampras , took two hours 40 minutes to defeat 186th-ranked Jaime Oncins of Brazil 3-6 6-1 6-0 7-6 , 8-6 in the tiebreaker .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O
text: Hopefully , this will have been my nerves for the whole tournament . " Joining Chang into the second round was Wimbledon runner-up MaliVai Washington , the 11th seed , who also needed four sets to get past talented Moroccan Karim Alami 6-4 2-6 7-6 ( 7-5 ) 6-1 .

labels: B_MISC I_MISC O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC I_MISC B_PER I_PER O O O O O
text: Australian Open runner-up Anke Huber of Germany , the sixth seed , was undone by an unlucky draw that put her against 17th ranked South African Amanda Coetzer in her opening match .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O B_LOC O O O O O O O O
text: Coetzer claimed revenge for the semifinal defeat she suffered to Huber in Melbourne by taking a 6-1 2-6 6-2 victory .

labels: O O O B_MISC O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O
text: Last year 's Wimbledon junior champion , Aleksandra Olsza of Poland , removed another seed from the draw by eliminating number 12 Magdalena Maleeva of Bulgaria 6-4 6-2 .

labels: B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O O O B_MISC O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O B_PER I_PER O B_LOC O O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O
text: Germany 's Michael Stich , the 1991 Wimbledon champion , and two-time French Open winner Sergi Bruguera of Spain will face each other next after beating German Tommy Haas 6-3 1-6 6-1 7-5 , and Belgian Kris Goossens 6-2 6-0 7-6 ( 7-1 ) , respectively .

labels: B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC I_LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC O B_PER I_PER O
text: Alex O'Brien , who scored his first professional title eight days ago in New Haven , advanced to the second round with a 6-4 1-6 6-4 6-3 win over Ecuador 's Nicolas Lapentti .

labels: O O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC B_PER I_PER O O O O O
text: Wimbledon bad boy Jeff Tarango caught a break Monday when he advanced after the retirement of German Alex Radulescu due to heat exhaustion .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_LOC B_MISC O
text: Chang blamed breezy conditions for some of the erratic play in his match with Oncins , who had beaten him in the round of 32 at the 1992 Barcelona Olympics .

labels: O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O O
text: Eighth seed Jim Courier withdrew because of a bruised right knee , and 1988 Open champion Mats Wilander bowed out due to a groin pull , organisers said .

text: Attendance : 20,000 SOCCER - MARSEILLE HOLD AUXERRE TO GOALLESS DRAW .

labels: B_LOC O O B_MISC O B_ORG O B_MISC O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: PARIS 1996-08-27 Former European champions Marseille held French champions Auxerre to a goalless draw in a lacklustre league match on Tuesday .

labels: B_ORG O O O O B_MISC I_MISC O O O O B_ORG I_ORG O O O O O O O O O O
text: Auxerre , who start their European Cup campaign next week against Ajax Amsterdam , dominated the match but were unable to score .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O
text: Lens , who have won all their three league matches so far , host Montpellier on Wednesday night .

labels: O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O
text: Despite another dismal performance , especially in defence , Marseille restored some pride by keeping the reigning champions at bay after losing 2-1 at home to Metz last Saturday .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B_MISC O B_ORG O O O O O O O
text: After two seasons in the second division and after taking on half a dozen new recruits this season , some of whom do not speak a word of French , Marseille are not playing with any fluidity .

labels: O B_MISC O O B_PER I_PER O O O O O O O O O O B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
text: But German international goalkeeper Andreas Koepke again proved a sound investment when under pressure from the Auxerre strikers , saving his team with a number of fine parries .

labels: B_ORG O O O O O O O O O O
text: Marseille now lie seventh in the league on five points .
